member.name: MANIPULATION_PROCESSOR_MANIPULATIONS
member.summary: The MANIPULATION_PROCESSOR_MANIPULATIONS enumeration different kinds of manipulation which can be applied on a target object.

member.name: MANIPULATION_PROCESSOR_MANIPULATIONS.MANIPULATION_NONE
member.summary: Indicates that no manipulations are performed.

member.name: MANIPULATION_PROCESSOR_MANIPULATIONS.MANIPULATION_TRANSLATE_X
member.summary: Indicates manipulation by moving the target across the horizontal axis.

member.name: MANIPULATION_PROCESSOR_MANIPULATIONS.MANIPULATION_TRANSLATE_Y
member.summary: Indicates manipulation by moving the target across the vertical axis.

member.name: MANIPULATION_PROCESSOR_MANIPULATIONS.MANIPULATION_SCALE
member.summary: Indicates manipulation by making the target larger or smaller.

member.name: MANIPULATION_PROCESSOR_MANIPULATIONS.MANIPULATION_ROTATE
member.summary: Indicates manipulation by rotating the target.
